lines.text: Would it satisfy me? It would positively inebriate me!
Never mind about his face, lady, you don't even have a face until you put it on in the morning.

[trying to explain the noise upstairs from the boxing training]
Plumbers trying to fix the roof. Might be 30 plumbers, you never can tell.
I wish I was in the ring, I'd fracture that guy.
You couldn't fracture a toy balloon.
